Missing out

The first paragraph will be displayed as excerpt in the overview page. It can be long or short and no html tags will be processed.

The next paragraph is the actual text.

Ruby
1 def show
2   @widget = Widget(params[:id])
3   respond_to do |format|
4     format.html # show.html.erb
5     format.json { render json: @widget }
6   end
7 end

C#

1 public class Klass
2 {
3   public string id { get;set;}
4   public Klass()
5   {
6     id = "123"; // just for testing
7   }
8 }

Javascript

1 var Klass = function() {
2   var id;
3   new() {
4     id = "123"; // just for testing
5   }
6 }

Erlang

1 duplicate(0,_) ->
2   [];
3 duplicate(N,Term) when N > 0 ->
4   [Term|duplicate(N-1,Term)].

Elixir

 1 parent = self()
 2 
 3 # Spawns an Elixir process (not an operating system one!)
 4 spawn_link(fn ->
 5   send parent, {:msg, "hello world"}
 6 end)
 7 
 8 # Block until the message is received
 9 receive do
10   {:msg, contents} -> IO.puts contents
11 end

F#

1 let printRating book =
2   match book.Rating with
3   | Some rating ->
4     printfn "I give this book %d star(s) out of 5!" rating
5   | None -> printfn "I didn't review this book"
